short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap any image online with a delicious taco. Add to Chrome and type ‘taco’ on any website or use your microphone. This is Taco Swap!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don’t forget to grab your FREE Crunchy Beef or Bean Taco from 9th – 15th May 2022, between 12-2pm at any of Taco Bell UK’s 95 restaurants here - https://locations.tacobell.co.uk/.
